info.name: Cerebellum, cortex, granule cell layer
info.description: The granule cell layer of cerebellar cortex is the innermost of the three cortical layers.  it is composed primarly of granule cells, Golgi neurons and the axons terminals of mossy fibers.  Granule cells are an excitatory interneuron.  They receive input from mossy fibers and send their axons into the molecular layer as the parallel fibers.
